statements: SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, pH, temperature, datetime FROM WaterQualityData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT datetime, pH FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH BETWEEN 6.5 AND 7.5;
SELECT id, temperature FROM WaterQualityData WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT id, datetime, pH FROM WaterQualityData ORDER BY pH ASC, datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, pH, temperature, datetime FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH < 7.0 ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT datetime, pH FROM WaterQualityData WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY pH ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, temperature FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH BETWEEN 6.5 AND 7.5 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT id, temperature, pH FROM WaterQualityData WHERE temperature < 20.0 OR pH > 7.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE datetime >= '2022-01-01' AND datetime < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH > 7.0
SELECT id, temperature FROM WaterQualityData ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, ammonia FROM AquacultureConditions WHERE oxygen < 5.0
SELECT id, pH, temperature FROM WaterQualityData WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25.0 AND 30.0
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH > 7.0 ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WaterQualityData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25.0 AND 30.0;
SELECT AVG(ammonia) as average_ammonia, MAX(oxygen) as max_oxygen FROM AquacultureConditions GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT MIN(pH) as min_pH, MAX(pH) as max_pH, AVG(pH) as avg_pH FROM WaterQualityData;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH < 6.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData;
SELECT id, pH, temperature FROM WaterQualityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT timestamp, pH, temperature FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH > 7;
SELECT tank_name, tank_capacity FROM AquacultureTanks WHERE tank_capacity < 1000;
SELECT tank_id, observation_timestamp, pH, temperature FROM AquacultureConditions WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30;
SELECT id, timestamp, pH, temperature FROM WaterQualityData;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH > 7.0;
SELECT tank_id, tank_name FROM AquacultureTanks ORDER BY tank_name DESC;
SELECT tank_id, tank_capacity FROM AquacultureTanks WHERE tank_capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY tank_capacity ASC;
SELECT tank_id, observation_timestamp, pH FROM AquacultureConditions WHERE temperature < 25.0 ORDER BY observation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements;
SELECT measurement_id, timestamp, ph FROM water_quality_measurements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(ph), AVG(temperature) FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM aquaculture_ponds WHERE location='Farm 1' ORDER BY pond_name;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM aquaculture_employees WHERE role='Manager';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE ph > 7 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT pond_name, location FROM aquaculture_ponds WHERE location LIKE '%lake%';
SELECT species_name, optimal_ph_range, optimal_temperature_range FROM aquaculture_species WHERE optimal_ph_range BETWEEN '6.5' AND '8.5';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_measurements WHERE temperature < 25;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM aquaculture_employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH > 7.0
SELECT species_name, average_weight FROM FishSpecies ORDER BY average_weight DESC
SELECT datetime, pH, temperature FROM WaterQualityData WHERE temperature < 25.0 ORDER BY datetime DESC
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM WaterSources
SELECT * FROM AquacultureConditions WHERE water_level < 0.5
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, pH, temperature FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pH > 7.0 AND temperature < 25.0
SELECT species_name, average_weight FROM FishSpecies WHERE average_weight >= 0.5 ORDER BY average_weight DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM WaterSources WHERE source_type = 'River'
SELECT * FROM DataLog WHERE data_type = 'pH' OR data_type = 'temperature'
